name: Faria, Ruler of Divine Beasts
text:
When this card enters your field â‡’ Put the top card of your magic stone deck into your field.
Each turn, you may play your first Inheritance ability without pay ing its cost. You still discard that card.
God's art <Pricia's Spirit Wind> 0: This card gains Barrier until end of turn. Play God's Art <Pricia's Spirit Wind> only once per game.
